Chinese.name: EventBridge Ckafka Target数据转储存
Chinese.description: 本示例会将Ckafka EB连接器的消息转存到另外一个 Ckafka topic 中。
Chinese.attention: 在使用本示例代码时需要传递相关的环境变量给函数。

English.name: eb_ckafka_target
English.description: This example consumes eb data and push these data to another kafka topic.
English.attention: When using this sample code, you need to pass some env variables to this function.
